dt: {bc}one of the terminal members of the vertebrate foot
{bc}the fore end of a foot or hoof
{bc}a terminal segment of a limb of an invertebrate
{bc}the forepart of something worn on the foot
{bc}a part that by its position or form is felt to resemble a toe
{bc}a lateral projection at one end or between the ends of a piece (such as a rod or bolt)
{bc}the lowest part (as of an embankment, dam, or cliff)

et: Middle English {it}to{/it}, from Old English {it}tā{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}zēha{/it} toe
shortdef: one of the terminal members of the vertebrate foot
the fore end of a foot or hoof
a terminal segment of a limb of an invertebrate

dt: {bc}to touch, reach, or drive with the toe
{bc}to drive (something, such as a nail) obliquely
{bc}to clinch or fasten by or with nails or rods so driven
{bc}to stand, walk, or be placed so that the toes assume an indicated position or direction
{bc}to conform rigorously to a rule or standard

shortdef: to touch, reach, or drive with the toe
to drive (something, such as a nail) obliquely; also : to clinch or fasten by or with nails or rods so driven

dt: {bc}a piece of material (such as leather) covering the toe of a shoe and reinforcing or decorating it

shortdef: a piece of material (such as leather) covering the toe of a shoe and reinforcing or decorating it

dt: {bc}a dance executed on the tips of the toes by means of a ballet slipper with a reinforced toe

shortdef: a dance executed on the tips of the toes by means of a ballet slipper with a reinforced toe

dt: {bc}adjustment of the front wheels of an automotive vehicle so that they are closer together at the front than at the back

shortdef: adjustment of the front wheels of an automotive vehicle so that they are closer together at the front than at the back

dt: {bc}a backward jump in figure skating with a takeoff from the outside edge of one skate followed by a full turn in the air and a landing on the outside edge of the same skate

shortdef: a backward jump in figure skating with a takeoff from the outside edge of one skate followed by a full turn in the air and a landing on the outside edge of the same skate

dt: {bc}slugging it out at or as if at close range

dt.t: a {wi}toe-to-toe{/wi} confrontation over the new policy

shortdef: slugging it out at or as if at close range

dt: {bc}the innermost and largest toe of the foot

shortdef: the innermost and largest toe of the foot —called also great toe

dt.t: There is a sudden onset of pain in one, maybe two joints, most often at the base of the {wi}great toe{/wi}.

dt: {bc}marked by a stride in which the heel of one foot touches the ground before the toe of the other foot leaves it

shortdef: marked by a stride in which the heel of one foot touches the ground before the toe of the other foot leaves it
